verses.t: Verily{G281}, verily{G281}, I say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, He that{G3588} entereth{G1525} not{G3361} by{G1223} the door{G3588} into{G1519} the sheepfold{G3588}, but{G235} climbeth up{G305} some other way{G237}, the same{G1565} is{G2076} a thief{G2812} and{G2532} a robber{G3027}."???????????????????" literally, "the house of the sheep"
But{G1161} he that{G3588} entereth in{G1525} by{G1223} the door{G3588} is{G2076} the shepherd{G4166} of the sheep{G3588}.

To him{G5129} the porter{G3588} openeth{G455}; and{G2532} the sheep{G3588} hear{G191} his{G846} voice{G3588}: and{G2532} he calleth{G2564} his own{G2398} sheep{G4263} by{G2596} name{G3686}, and{G2532} leadeth{G1806} them{G846} out{G1806}.

And{G2532} when{G3752} he putteth forth{G1544} his own{G2398} sheep{G4263}, he{G846} goeth{G4198} before them{G1715}, and{G2532} the sheep{G3588} follow{G190} him{G846}: for{G3754} they know{G1492} his{G846} voice{G3588}.

And{G1161} a stranger{G245} will they{G190} not{G3756} follow{G190}, but{G235} will flee{G5343} from{G575} him{G846}for{G3754} they know{G1492} not{G3756} the voice{G3588} of strangers{G245}.Double negatives intensify negation in Greek. "?????????????????" literally, "shall not not follow"

This{G3778} parable{G3588} spake{G2036} Jesus{G3588} unto them{G846}: but{G1161} they{G1565} understood{G1097} not{G3756} what things{G5101} they were{G2258} which{G3739} he spake{G2980} unto them{G846}.
Then{G3767} said{G2036} Jesus{G3588} unto them{G846} again{G3825}, Verily{G281}, verily{G281}, I say{G3004} unto you{G5213}, I{G1473} am{G1510} the door{G3588} of the sheep{G3588}.
All that{G3956} ever{G3745} came{G2064} before{G4253} me{G1700} are{G1526} thieves{G2812} and{G2532} robbers{G3027}: but{G235} the sheep{G3588} did{G191} not{G3756} hear{G191} them{G846}.

I{G1473} am{G1510} the door{G3588}: by{G1223} me{G1700} if{G1437} any man{G5100} enter in{G1525}, he shall be saved{G4982}, and{G2532} shall go in{G1525} and{G2532} out{G1831}, and{G2532} find{G2147} pasture{G3542}.

The thief{G3588} cometh{G2064} not{G3756}, but{G1487} for{G2443} to steal{G2813}, and{G2532} to kill{G2380}, and{G2532} to destroy{G622}: I{G1473} am come{G2064} that{G2443} they might have{G2192} life{G2222}, and{G2532} that{G2443} they might have{G2192} it more abundantly{G4053}.
I{G1473} am{G1510} the{G3588} good{G2570} shepherd{G4166}: the{G3588} good{G2570} shepherd{G4166} giveth{G5087} his{G846} life{G3588} for{G5228} the sheep{G3588}.

But{G1161} he that is an hireling{G3588}, and{G2532} not{G3756} the shepherd{G4166}, whose own{G2398} the sheep{G3588} are{G1526} not{G3739}, seeth{G2334} the wolf{G3588} coming{G2064}, and{G2532} leaveth{G863} the sheep{G3588}, and{G2532} fleeth{G5343}: and{G2532} the wolf{G3588} catcheth{G726} them{G846}, and{G2532} scattereth{G4650} the sheep{G3588}.
The hireling{G3411} fleeth{G5343}, because{G3754} he is{G2076} an hireling{G3411}, and{G2532} careth{G3199} not{G3756} for{G4012} the sheep{G3588}.
I{G1473} am{G1510} the{G3588} good{G2570} shepherd{G4166}, and{G2532} know{G1097} my{G1699} sheep, and{G2532} am known{G1097} of{G5259} mine{G1699}.
As{G2531} the Father{G3588} knoweth{G1097} me{G3165}, even so{G2504} know I{G1097} the Father{G3588}: and{G2532} I lay down{G5087} my{G3450} life{G3588} for{G5228} the sheep{G3588}.

And{G2532} other{G243} sheep{G4263} I have{G2192}, which{G3739} are{G2076} not{G3756} of{G1537} this{G3778} fold{G3588}: them also{G2548} I{G3165} must{G1163} bring{G71}, and{G2532} they shall hear{G191} my{G3450} voice{G3588}; and{G2532} there shall be{G1096} one{G1520} fold{G4167}, and one{G1520} shepherd{G4166}.
Therefore{G1223} doth{G25} my Father{G3588} love{G25} me{G3165}, because{G3754} I{G1473} lay down{G5087} my{G3450} life{G3588}that{G2443} I might take{G2983} it{G846} again{G3825}.

No man{G3762} taketh{G142} it{G846} from{G575} me{G1700}, but{G235} I{G1473} lay{G5087} it{G846} down{G5087} of{G575} myself{G1683}. I have{G2192} power{G1849} to lay{G5087} it{G846} down{G5087}, and{G2532} I have{G2192} power{G1849} to take{G2983} it{G846} again{G3825}. This{G3778} commandment{G3588} have I received{G2983} of{G3844} my{G3450} Father{G3588}.
There was{G1096} a division{G4978} therefore{G3767} again{G3825} among{G1722} the Jews{G2453} for{G1223} these{G5128} sayings{G3588}.
And{G1161} many of them{G4183} said{G3004}, He hath{G2192} a devil{G1140}, and{G2532} is mad{G3105}; why{G5101} hear ye{G191} him{G846}?
Others{G243} said{G3004}, These{G5023} are{G2076} not{G3756} the words{G3588} of him that hath a devil{G1139}. Can{G1410} a devil{G1140} open{G455} the eyes{G3788} of the blind{G5185}?
And{G1161} it was{G1096} at{G1722} Jerusalem{G3588} the feast of the dedication{G3588}, and{G2532} it was{G2258} winter{G5494}.
And{G2532} Jesus{G3588} walked{G4043} in{G1722} the temple{G3588} in{G1722} Solomon's{G3588} porch{G3588}.

Then{G3767} came{G2944} the Jews{G2453} round about{G2944} him{G846}, and{G2532} said{G3004} unto him{G846}, How{G4219} long{G2193} dost thou make{G142} us{G2257} to doubt{G142}? If{G1487} thou{G4771} be{G1488} the Christ{G3588}, tell{G2036} us{G2254} plainly{G3954}.

Jesus{G3588} answered{G611} them{G846}, I told{G2036} you{G5213}, and{G2532} ye believed{G4100} not{G3756}: the works{G3588} that{G3739} I{G1473} do{G4160} in{G1722} my{G3450} Father's{G3588} name{G3588}, they{G5023} bear witness{G3140} of{G4012} me{G1700}.
But{G235} ye{G5210} believe{G4100} not{G3756}, because{G1063} ye are{G2075} not{G3756} of{G1537} my{G1699} sheep{G3588}, as{G2531} I said{G2036} unto you{G5213}.
My{G1699} sheep{G3588} hear{G3588} my{G3450} voice{G191}, and I{G2504} know{G1097} them{G846}, and{G2532} they follow{G190} me{G3427}:

And I{G2504} give{G1325} unto them{G846} eternal{G166} life{G2222}; and{G2532} they shall{G622} never{G3756} perish{G622}, neither{G3756} shall{G726} any{G5100} man pluck{G726} them{G846} out of{G1537} my{G3450} hand{G3588}.

My{G3450} Father{G3588}, which{G3739} gave{G1325} them me{G3427}, is{G2076} greater than{G3187} all{G3956}; and{G2532} no{G3762} man is able to{G1410} pluck{G726} them out of{G1537} my{G3450} Father's{G3588} hand{G3588}.
I{G1473} and{G2532} my Father{G3588} are{G2070} one{G1520}.
Then{G3767} the Jews{G2453} took up{G941} stones{G3037} again{G3825} to{G2443} stone{G3034}him{G846}.

Jesus{G3588} answered{G611} them{G846}, Many{G4183} good{G2570} works{G2041} have I shewed{G1166} you{G5213} from{G1537} my{G3450} Father{G3588}; for{G1223} which{G4169} of those{G846} works{G2041} do ye stone{G3034} me{G3165}?

The Jews{G2453} answered{G611} him{G846}, saying{G3004}, For{G4012} a{G2041} good{G2570} work{G2041} we stone{G3034} thee{G4571} not{G3756}; but{G235} for{G4012} blasphemy{G988}; and{G2532} because that{G3754} thou{G4771}, being{G5607} a man{G444}, makest{G4160} thyself{G4572} God{G2316}.
Jesus{G3588} answered{G611} them{G846}, Is it{G2076} not{G3756} written{G1125} in{G1722} your{G5216} law{G3588}, I{G1473} said{G2036}, Ye are{G2075} gods{G2316}?
If{G1487} he called{G2036} them{G1565} gods{G2316}, unto{G4314} whom{G3739} the word{G3588} of God{G3588} came{G1096}, and{G2532} the scripture{G3588} can{G1410}not{G3756} be broken{G3089};

Say{G3004} ye{G5210} of{G3004} him, whom{G3739} the Father{G3588} hath sanctified{G37}, and{G2532} sent{G649} into{G1519} the world{G3588}, Thou blasphemest{G987}; because{G3754} I said{G2036}, I am{G1510} the Son{G5207} of God{G3588}?
If{G1487} I do{G4160} not{G3756} the works{G3588} of{G3588} my{G3450} Father{G3962}, believe{G4100} me{G3427} not{G3361}.

But{G1161} if{G1487} I do{G4160}, though{G2579} ye believe{G4100} not{G3361} me{G1698}, believe{G4100} the works{G3588}: that{G2443} ye may know{G1097}, and{G2532} believe{G4100}, that{G3754} the Father{G3588} is in{G1722} me{G1698}, and I{G2504} in{G1722} him{G846}.The verb "to be" in the phrase "[T]he Father is in meâ€¦" is unstated in the Greek.
Therefore{G3767} they sought{G2212} again{G3825} to take{G4084} him{G846}: but{G2532} he escaped{G1831} out of{G1537} their{G846} hand{G3588},
And{G2532} went away{G565} again{G3825} beyond{G4008} Jordan{G3588} into{G1519} the place{G3588} where{G3699} John{G2491} at first{G4413} baptized{G907}; and{G2532} there{G1563} he abode{G3306}.

And{G2532} many{G4183} resorted{G2064} unto{G4314} him{G846}, and{G2532} said{G3004}, John{G2491} did{G4160} no{G3762} miracle{G4592}: but{G1161} all things{G3956} that{G3745} John{G2491} spake{G2036} of{G4012} this man{G5127} were{G2258} true{G227}.
And{G2532} many{G4183} believed{G4100} on{G1519} him{G846} there{G1563}.
